contact.title: Let's build something remarkable together.
contact.description: Have a question, a project idea, or just want to connect? Drop me a line. I love tackling new challenges and designing intuitive experiences.

form.projectDetailsPlaceholder: Tell me about your project, timeline, and goals.

card.title: Direct contact
card.description: Need a quick chat? Leave me a message and I'll get back to you within one business day.

empty.description: I am curating case studies and tutorials to share soon. In the meantime, feel free to reach out and let's talk about your project.
